short_description: fribel gulf is a flooring contractor based in qatar.
long_description: fribel is based in the middle east specializing in all aspects of epoxy terrazzo flooring. with offices in the middle east, fribel gulf is geared towards the growing and vibrant g.c.c. market. fribel's branch in the united states specializes in the procurement, supply and shipment of terrazzo materials, and our highly trained, skilled talent is drawn from its european offices. our company has been supplying products and installing epoxy terrazzo floors, stairs and architectural elements of the highest quality for over 25 years. thanks to large commissions and projects installed worldwide, including airports, hospitals, hotels, shopping centers, convention centers, educational institutions and universities, train stations, and even palaces and villas, the company's experience exceeds any average terrazzo operation. in addition to outstanding mechanics with years of experience in precast and in situ installations, fribel has advanced support personnel with deep knowledge in various aspects of construction, including architects, surveyors, quality assurance, quality control and logistics staff.
generated_description: fribel gulf is a company based in doha, qatar, specializing in epoxy terrazzo flooring. it operates in the middle east and has expanded its services to include the united states, where it focuses on the procurement, supply, and shipment of terrazzo materials. the company has been involved in numerous high-profile projects, including the installation of over 140,000 square meters of epoxy terrazzo at the new hamad international airport. fribel gulf provides comprehensive project support, including initial floor design, production of necessary drawings and specifications, and the installation of the epoxy terrazzo system. the company is a member of the national terrazzo and mosaic association and the us green building council, emphasizing its commitment to quality and sustainability in construction.
